articles.title: Illegal Aliens Quietly Being Relocated Throughout U.S. on Commercial Flights
articles.description: Immigrants entering the United States illegally through the southern border are quietly being relocated to different parts of the country on commercial flights, high-ranking Homeland Security officials told Judicial Watch this week. In the last few days alone…

articles.author: By Mark Reagan Staff Writer
articles.title: Hundreds flock to make RV reservations
articles.description: BROWNSVILLE — Hundreds of people who camped out overnight Sunday on South Padre Island waited in long lines early Monday morning for their chance to make summer reservations for RV sites at Isla Blanca and Andy Bowie County parks.
